string.text:
The aim of the FN F2000 was to produce a modular weapon offering all of the popular features of the modern assault rifle such as a compact bullpup layout, an ambidextrous frame and a design with plenty of available options and addons. So far, the FN F2000 rifle has found only a few buyers, including the Armed Forces of Slovenia and Belgian Special Operations Forces. Regardless, it is in no doubt a unique and futuristic-looking weapon, looking like something straight out of a sci-fi movie.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Belgium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]FN Herstal

The aim of the FN F2000 was to produce a modular weapon offering all of the popular features of the modern assault rifle such as a compact bullpup layout, an ambidextrous frame and a design with plenty of available options and addons. So far, the FN F2000 rifle has found only a few buyers, including the Armed Forces of Slovenia and Belgian Special Operations Forces. Regardless, it is in no doubt a unique and futuristic-looking weapon, looking like something straight out of a sci-fi movie. Equipped with an EOTech sight and specially modified for a faster rate of fire, the "Competitor" knows only competition.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Belgium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]FN Herstal
